title: Audit Database Security
description: An IT auditor reviews the security configuration of a critical financial database.

tasks.description: Review the database configuration to ensure that security patches are up to date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that the database has not been patched in over a year and is missing several critical security patches.

tasks.description: Check the database user accounts to ensure that default or weak passwords are not in use.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that all users have complex passwords.

tasks.description: Verify that activity on the database is being logged to a secure, separate log server.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that audit logging is enabled and functioning correctly.
